p: The reduced and total ascorbic acid (AsA and AsA TOT) were quantified according to the method of Kampfenkel et al. [ 29]. Fresh samples (200 mg) were extracted in 2 mL 6% ( w/v) trichloroacetic acid (TCA) solution, as described by Degl’Innocenti et al. [ 30]. The data are reported as μg of AsA TOT per g of FW.
